org.openimaj.experiment.evaluation.classification

Class BasicClassificationResult<CLASS>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.experiment.evaluation.classification.BasicClassificationResult<CLASS>
  • Type Parameters:
    CLASS - type of class predicted by the Classifier
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassificationResult<CLASS>

    public class BasicClassificationResult<CLASS>
extends Object
implements ClassificationResult<CLASS>
    A basic implementation of a ClassificationResult that internally maintains a map of classes to confidences.

    A threshold is used to determine whether a class has a high-enough confidence to be considered part of the predicted set of classes.

    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • getConfidence

        public double getConfidence(CLASS clazz)
        Description copied from interface: ClassificationResult
        Get the confidence associated with the given class. If the class is unknown, then this method should return 0.

        Normally, confidence values are bounded between 0 and 1.

        Specified by:
        getConfidence in interface ClassificationResult<CLASS>
        Parameters:
        clazz - the target class.
        Returns:
        the confidence in assigning the class.

      • getPredictedClasses

        public Set<CLASS> getPredictedClasses()
        Description copied from interface: ClassificationResult
        Get the set of classes predicted by this result. Usually, this is a subset of all classes; specifically those with a high confidence.
        Specified by:
        getPredictedClasses in interface ClassificationResult<CLASS>
        Returns:
        the set of predicted classes.
